vclaim: American gymnast Kerri Strug needed to perform the vault on an injured ankle in order for Team USA to win a gold medal at the 1996 Olympics.
title: Was Kerri Strug Team USA’s Only Chance for Gold?
subtitle: Kerri Strug fought through the pain of an ankle injury to compete at the 1996 Olympic Games, but was it necessary?
author: Dan Evon
